org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.name: Error-AddPastVisit
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.sqlQuery: select encounter.patient_id, encounter.visit_id as VisitID, pid1.identifier as PepfarID, pid2.identifier as HospID, encounter.encounter_datetime as VisitDate, form.name as PMMForm from encounter LEFT JOIN visit on(encounter.visit_id=visit.visit_id and encounter.voided=0 and visit.voided=0) LEFT JOIN form on(form.form_id=encounter.form_id and encounter.voided=0) LEFT JOIN patient_identifier pid1 on(pid1.patient_id=encounter.patient_id and pid1.identifier_type=4 and pid1.voided=0) LEFT JOIN patient_identifier pid2 on(pid2.patient_id=encounter.patient_id and pid2.identifier_type=5 and pid2.voided=0) where encounter.encounter_datetime BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate and encounter.voided=0 and encounter.visit_id is null;
